    A ship came and smacked the ground by Maximal City.  It went skidding, =
then it hit a tree and came to a halt.  It looked pretty damaged.  However,=
 the bot inside wasn't, fortunately for the Maximals which he was most like=
ly to join.  The pod scanned for a beast mode, and it chose....it chose....=
It broke down.  So now, the bot inside, would have no organic anything, com=
pletely mechanical.  He hadn't come out yet.  But, finally, the bot inside =
burst out by firing a shot from some sort of energy weapon.  There was flam=
es and scraps of the pod door everywhere.  The bot inside emerged, and walk=
ed out of the wreckage.

        "Ah finally, I've made it to this damned r=
ock!  'Bout time!" the bot said, brushing some char and and stuff off of hi=
m.

        The bot turned around to look at the rest of his pod.  He extan=
ded his arm, and spread out his fingers, so that his palm was facing the wr=
eckage.  Then, a hole in his palm opened up, then a short spikey thing came=
 out.  It charged up some swirling energy, then, fired a blast at the crash=
 site.  All of the scraps, grass and the tree were blown up to smithereens.=
  The spike thing went back inside of his hand, and the hole closed, and th=
en he pulled back his arm, turned around and went walking towards Maximal C=
ity.

        "Heh, there's every need to fear, 'cause Weapon is here!" the=
 bot said, revealing his name to be Weapon...

        Weapon, from a safe =
distance, stopped.  He pressed a few buttons and stuff, and eventually mana=
ged to get a fairly large fusion cannon.  He aimed it at Maximal City, and =
fired a blast from the fusion cannon at it.



~The Keeper of Souls~
~The S=
hadow of the Dark~
~I Am, The Lurker of the Abyss~
